/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a winding road in Beijing, China. The road, a two-lane highway, is flanked by lush green trees on both sides, creating a natural canopy overhead. A white van is seen driving down the road, adding a touch of life to the otherwise tranquil setting. The sky above is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds dotting the horizon. The perspective of the image is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the road and its surroundings.
